tagline: Real Technology Support. Real Systems. Real People.

description: SeeZee Studios is a community technology partner built on trust and real support. We started on the ground â€” fixing computers, solving real problems, and supporting staff and students day-to-day. That long-term trust is what we're built on.

team.name: Sean
